skill.name: plans-handler
skill.description: Manage subscription plans, pricing, and quotas. Use when adding plan features, updating limits, or building pricing pages.
skill.summary: Manage subscription plans, pricing, and quotas. Use when adding plan features, updating limits, or b...
skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only markdown documentation with no executable code. It provides guidance on subscription plan management without any network, filesystem, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Building subscription systems requires managing plans, limits, and quotas across database, validation, and UI layers. This skill provides step-by-step guidance for implementing and maintaining subscription features in SaaS applications.
actual_capabilities: Add new quota limits to database schema
Create validation schemas for plan forms
Access current user plan data client-side and server-side
limitations: Requires manual configuration in admin dashboard

use_cases.title: Implement subscription quotas
use_cases.description: Add new usage limits like image generations or API calls to your SaaS platform

use_cases.title: Build pricing pages
use_cases.description: Create pricing tables that display plan features and link to checkout flows

use_cases.title: Manage plan schema
use_cases.description: Synchronize database, validation, and form schemas for plan data consistency

prompt_templates.title: Add new quota
prompt_templates.prompt: How do I add a new quota limit to track user API usage in the database schema, validation, and form?

prompt_templates.title: Create pricing table
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me how to fetch plans and create a pricing table with feature lists and subscribe buttons.

prompt_templates.title: Get user plan
prompt_templates.prompt: How do I check the current user's subscription plan on the client side and server side?

prompt_templates.title: Sync schemas
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the best practices for keeping database schema, validation schema, and form in sync when updating plans?

output_examples.input: How do I add a new 'api_calls' quota limit?
output: 1. Add field to quotaSchema in src/db/schema/plans.ts
2. Add field to planFormSchema in src/lib/validations/plan.schema.ts
4. Ask user to update plan via /super-admin/plans dashboard

best_practices: Use the super admin dashboard to configure plans rather than manual seeding
Keep database, validation, and form schemas synchronized when adding new quotas
Set provider IDs (Stripe, PayPal) in the plan dashboard for checkout integration
anti_patterns: Hardcoding plan limits in multiple files instead of using the quota schema
Skipping validation schema updates when adding new plan features
Using time-bound names like monthly_images instead of usage-based names like images

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for subscription management tasks.

faq.question: What quotas can I track with this skill?
faq.answer: Any usage-based limit including API calls, image generations, storage, or custom metrics.

faq.question: How do I integrate with Stripe?
faq.answer: Set Stripe price IDs in the plan dashboard. Use getSubscribeUrl helper to generate checkout URLs.

faq.question: Is my billing data stored securely?
faq.answer: This skill only provides guidance. Actual data storage depends on your database and payment provider.

faq.question: Why is my pricing table not updating?
faq.answer: Ensure you are fetching from the API and the dashboard has the latest plan configuration.

faq.question: How is this different from stripe-handler?
faq.answer: Plans-handler manages quota limits and plan schema. Stripe-handler handles actual payment processing.
